EmailTemplate.name: NA_Tier2_Commercial_Warm_EB.Tier3_Commercial_Cold_EB_Nurture_Email3
EmailTemplate.subject: How Cisco Achieves Success at Scale with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Using Turbonomic, Cisco was able to improve VM performance by reducing resource contention by 80%, as well as become more efficient, avoiding the build-out of a new data center, saving Cisco nearly $20 Million in the process.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/cisco-turbonomic-success-scale-turbonomic-customer-success-story/]]>
"Turbonomic saved us 54 terabytes of memory. It saved us 4800 virtual CPU cores. And so we could add, after that reboot, another 2200 servers, for free, to the environment." - Mike Myers, Sr. Director of Cloud Orchestration & Platform Services at Cisco
Schedule a Demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> and learn how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
